original: My wife and I are in our late seventies and would like to meet some open-minded couples in Firefly for some fun and frolics, and by fun and frolics I'm talking about saggy titties in your face and a coochie dry as dust.   After 50 years of the missionary position, we feel that it is time to broaden our horizons while we still can.  We get tired easily and need regular bathroom breaks but there is life in these old dogs yet!  You'll be amazed what my wife can do when she takes her teeth out!  Any day of the week works for us but please bear in mind that we go to bed at 6 PM and wear diapers to catch everything while we pee ourselves during the night.  Don't be surprised if we look at you with a blank expression when we open the door - our memory is not what it used to be!  I put on 4 pairs of trousers this morning!  Email us with photos and a brief summary of what you hope to get out of our liaison.  We have a few ideas but would love to hear your suggestions.   We think that the stair-lift could certainly feature in the proceedings!  We will provide snacks (liquidized, I'm afraid) and we have a cupboard full of prescription drugs.  What are you waiting for?
translated: 妻子和我都七老八十了，现在我们想在Firefly附近找对思想开放的夫妇，和我们嬉戏玩耍。嬉戏玩耍就是说松弛下垂的奶子和荒漠戈壁一般的逼。用传教士体位做了50年，我们觉得有必要趁还能动弹的时候开开眼界了。我俩很容易累，中间经常需要去厕所，但老家伙的生活还是有活力的！等我妻子摘下假牙，你一定会为她的绝活感到惊奇的。我们每天都有课，但是请记住，晚上6点我们就睡了，睡觉时失禁的大小便全靠尿布兜着。来开门的时候看着你一脸茫然也不要惊讶，记性也没以前那么好啦！今早我居然穿了四条裤子！邮件联系我们的时候请带上照片和备注，说明你想找我们做什么。我们有自己的主意，但也很乐意了解你的想法。我们觉得那个活动扶梯就挺好使的！到时候可以给你提供零食(不好意思，只有流食)，还有一柜子的处方药。你还在等什么呢？
